text: Aur jab tum apni aurton ko tallaq do aur woh apni iddat poori ker len o unhen unn kay khawindon say nikkah kerney say na roko jab kay woh aapas mein dastoor kay mutabiq raza mand hon. Yeh naseehat unhen ki jati hai jinhen tum mein say Allah Taalaa per aur qayamat kay din per yaqeen-o-eman ho iss mein tumhari behtareen safaee aur pakeezgi hai. Allah Taalaa janta hai aur tum nahi jantay
